0011110100001010 0110101001110110 1 -> sum: 1010011110000001, cout: 0
1000011010111011 0010001100101110 1 -> sum: 1010100111101010, cout: 0
0011100111010111 0010011001101101 1 -> sum: 0110000001000101, cout: 0
1110010100011110 1101110111111111 0 -> sum: 1100001100011101, cout: 1
0101111100110100 0000100111000111 0 -> sum: 0110100011111011, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0

1111111111111111 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
